item.title: BMI Proves Reliable for Youth Adiposity Detection
item.description: Researchers found that anthropometric measures alone were as effective as DEXA in confirming excess adiposity. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Later Breakfast Tied to Morbidity, Mortality in Older Adults
item.description: Shifts in meal timing, particularly to a later breakfast, may reflect health changes in older adults that are linked to morbidity and mortality. Medsc...

item.title: Earlier Intervention Becomes the New BP Standard
item.description: Updated AHA/ACC guidelines call for starting treatment sooner, lowering thresholds, and expanding strategies to curb hypertension risks. Medscape Medi...

item.title: Neonatal Alert: Safety Limit Set for Oral Seizure Suspension
item.description: Europe’s medicines regulator has issued guidance limiting the use of a seizure medication in neonates due to higher-than-safe propylene glycol levels ...

item.title: AI-Based OCT Spotted Cardiovascular Risk
item.description: AI-based OCT image analysis of thin-cap fibroatheromas captures ‘the complete picture, not just the angiographic hotspot.’ Medscape Medical News
